files.content:
# Mi9 [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/mattolde/Mi9.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/mattolde/Mi9)

Mi9 interview challenge which accepts JSON data and filters the data to return new JSON data.

Live endpoint: https://hidden-ocean-6829.herokuapp.com/

Built using:

- Node
- Express
- Mocha
- Chai
- Heroku
- TravisCI


## Testing

Tests are build using mocha and chai.

To run test use the following command in console.
`npm test`

TravisCI runs test on push or pull request.

# Logs
logs
*.log

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed

# Directory for instrumented libs generated by jscoverage/JSCover
lib-cov

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage

# Grunt intermediate storage (http://gruntjs.com/creating-plugins#storing-task-files)
.grunt

# Compiled binary addons (http://nodejs.org/api/addons.html)
build/Release

# Dependency directory
# Commenting this out is preferred by some people, see
# https://www.npmjs.org/doc/misc/npm-faq.html#should-i-check-my-node_modules-folder-into-git-
node_modules

# Users Environment Variables
.lock-wscript

# Tests
*.json

language: node_js
node_js:
- '0.10'
deploy:
  provider: heroku
  api_key:
    secure: UUUY1tCedcmXoLHhd18UStNW0gA2WYH1RKHhU/DL8IOQPKoQMLpIrJaNKuikB9wL2Fio3OMvQ3yeXcvJ+E5e+bk1fq1YfcpZTrWIz4SAHLh6t6K/pH1gwA4GQMAFb2TA8gMnCIOr7WY8MhnKguP+e6tBg33Pz7W9h8cJwVj+VjM=
  app: hidden-ocean-6829

description: Mostly written in Javascript. Code contains the following Javascript (37%), YAML (12%), JSON (12%), MARKDOWN (12%), Git Ignore (12%). Using the following technologies JSON. It has a git/mercural ignore file. It has a README file. It appears to be concice.
